s2.name: Packages download

ul.li: joram-3.6.0.tgz, including JORAM libraries and samples;
joram-3.6.0-src.tgz, including JORAM sources and samples;
kjoram-3.6.0.tgz, including kJORAM libraries and sample;
kjoram-3.6.0-src.tgz, including kJORAM sources and sample.

s2.p:
The download area is at
ObjectWeb Forge.

s2.name: CVS checkout
s2.p: JORAM and kJORAM are available by checking out the joram module from CVS.
The latest release tag is joram3_6_0.
